TITLESTMT.TITLE: Letter To R. Stevens Dated July 1st, 1875 From Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co. (It would appear that this document was give to Robert shortly before or after he became employed on August 1, 1875, by the Hannibal and St. Joseph Rail Road Company as General Manager. It is not in his handwriting. On the reverse of the document is written: "Han. and St. Jo R.R. Co. Statement, and c.; July 1st /75.)"
TITLESTMT.AUTHOR: Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co.

BIBL.TITLE: Letter To R. Stevens Dated July 1st, 1875 From Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co. (It would appear that this document was give to Robert shortly before or after he became employed on August 1, 1875, by the Hannibal and St. Joseph Rail Road Company as General Manager. It is not in his handwriting. On the reverse of the document is written: "Han. and St. Jo R.R. Co. Statement, and c.; July 1st /75.)"
BIBL.AUTHOR: Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co.
BIBL.PUBLISHER: Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co.

TITLESTMT.TITLE: Letter To R. Stevens Dated July 1, 1875 From the Hannibal and St. Joseph R.R. (This document is in the same handwriting as is 750701-B, therefore it is assumed that it was prepared for Robert upon his appointment as General Manager of the Hannibal and St. Jo R.R. There is a discrepancy, however. The $500,000 Quincy and Palmyra Bonds are not included in the prior document.)
TITLESTMT.AUTHOR: R. Stevens

BIBL.TITLE: Letter To R. Stevens Dated July 1, 1875 From the Hannibal and St. Joseph R.R. (This document is in the same handwriting as is 750701-B, therefore it is assumed that it was prepared for Robert upon his appointment as General Manager of the Hannibal and St. Jo R.R. There is a discrepancy, however. The $500,000 Quincy and Palmyra Bonds are not included in the prior document.)
BIBL.AUTHOR: R. Stevens
BIBL.PUBLISHER: Hannibal and St. Joseph Railroad Co.
